page.title: 17BLURTON METHODIST CHURCH
page.content: On Thursday afternoon he visited Bucknall Hospital. In the evening he made arrangements for a marriage and went to a Sunday School teacher's meeting.Friday is supposed to be his day off, but he prepares for Sunday. Mr. Dodd went to the Normacot flower festival and in the afternoon held a wedding service at Fenton. Sunday is the climax of the week and he holds services in the morning and afternoon. In the evening he went to a Trentham fellowship barbeque. Mr. Dodd also visits New Park, Edith Bevill and the Longton Fellowship of churches. Mr. Dodd has worked in the Methodist church for 31 years and at Blurton for 5 years. The church holds a craft class, women's meeting and a bible study. Also it supports a number of charities like Christian aid, Methodist Missionary Society, and National Children's Home.
